dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3857303Q] Copyright Infringement Notice [allmedicalinfo.com]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2007 11:16 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3857303Q] Copyright Infringement Notice [allmedicalinfo.com] ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Wed, 18 Apr 2007 14:15:13 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.100.108.2 with HTTP; Wed, 18 Apr 2007 14:15:13 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: Date: Wed, 18 Apr 2007 22:15:13 +0100 From: Medic8 To: aler@aler.com.ua X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Copyright Infringement Notice [allmedicalinfo.com] Subject: Copyright Infringement Notice [allmedicalinfo.com] Cc: abuse@ev1servers.net MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_84983_2419442.1176930913768" X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: medic8.com@gmail.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 18 Apr 2007 21:15:30.0557 (UTC) FILETIME=[B1A782D0:01C781FE] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) FAO: Alexander Kazantsev *Copyright Infringement Notice* It has come to my attention that your website at www.allmedicalinfo.com, contains copyrighted content from our website at www.medic8.com. According to my records, I have not authorised such use. Your website contains numerous articles that have been stolen from our online healthguide. All content on our website(s) is copyright & may not be copied or reproduced without written authorisation. I require that you remove all the offending articles from your website within 48 hours and refrain from copying any of our published content in future. Should you fail to remove our content from your website, we will file a DMCA complaint to Google -- in all likelihood your AdSense account will be banned as a result. Sincerely, Dr R Potter Director, Medic8 Ltd Note: This letter serves as actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings. This letter shall not be deemed to be a waiver of any rights or remedies, which are expressly reserved. Websites owned by copyright infringer: 1) allcountrytabs.com 2) allmedicalinfo.com 3) allmusicals.com 4) art-posters-shop.com 5) barmandrinks.com 6) cowboylyrics.com 7) culinarybook.com 8) dance-lyrics.com 9) freedrinkrecipes.com 10) fresh-lyrics.com 11) indalyrics.com 12) jazzblueslyrics.com 13) lyrics-tabs.com 14) myhappylove.com 15) popular-lyrics.com 16) recipeslist.com 17) ringtonemelody.com 18) songs.dance-lyrics.com 19) soundtracklyrics.net 20) thebroadwaymusicals.com MIME element (text/html) FAO: Alexander Kazantsev

*Copyright Infringement Notice*

It has come to my attention that your website at www.allmedicalinfo.com ,
contains copyrighted content from our website at www.medic8.com.
According to my records, I have not authorised such use.

Your website contains numerous articles that have been stolen from
our online healthguide. All content on our website(s) is copyright
& may not be copied or reproduced without written authorisation.

I require that you remove all the offending articles from your website
within 48 hours and refrain from copying any of our published content
in future.

Should you fail to remove our content from your website,
we will file a DMCA complaint to Google -- in all likelihood
your AdSense account will be banned as a result.

Sincerely,

Dr R Potter
Director, Medic8 Ltd

Note: This letter serves as actual notice of infringement in  the
event of legal proceedings. This letter shall not be deemed to
be a waiver of any rights or remedies, which are expressly
reserved.
